title.rendered: Accent Equity-owned Linotol Group acquires C M Betong

content.rendered:
Linotol Group has completed the acquisition of C M Betong, a supplier of on-site ready-mixed concrete with mobile, purpose-built machinery and concrete mixing services. The founder of C M Betong is reinvesting in the companies alongside Accent Equity and the founders of Linotol, C Holmqvist and Tiller-Vimek. Closing of the transaction took place in December 2023.

Linotol Group is a market leading supplier of industrial flooring solutions for commercial, public and industrial use with a presence in Sweden and Norway, and a platform for growth created by Accent Equity through the acquisitions of Linotol, C Holmqvist Entreprenad and Tiller-Vimek.

Linotol Group was represented by Mannheimer Swartling in the transaction.
